attributes.action: Allow children to be called children and not kids
attributes.additional_details:
The definiton of the word Kid is as below
1.
a. A young goat.
b. The young of a similar animal, such as an antelope.
2.
a. The flesh of a young goat.
b. Leather made from the skin of a young goat; kidskin.
c. An article made from this leather.
3. Informal
a. A child.
b. A young person.


I hereby am asking for the UK Govemrnent to respect children and allow a child under the age of 18 be called a Child and not a Kid, therefore all Children will be called Children, therefore dropping the informal meaning from the dictionary
